players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I'm shocked about Bob's death. We need to figure out who did this. Alice, your silence seems suspicious - why aren't you contributing to finding the killer?"

Charlie: "Diana, you've also been completely silent. With both you and Alice saying nothing, it's hard to tell who we can trust. At least one of you needs to speak up so we can work together to find Bob's killer."

players.name: Charlie

Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
